cbioportalR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Get segmentation data

    get_segments.Rd

    Get segmentation data

    get_segments(sample_ids = NULL, study_id = "all_tcga_studies")

    Arguments

    sample_ids

    A character vector of sample ids.

    study_id

    A character vector of lenght 1 indicating study_id. Default is "all_tcga_studies" which queries all TCGA cancer studies, unless you are connected to MSKCC host in which case default is "mskimpact".

    Value

    Returns a dataframe of segmentation data

    Examples

    get_cbioportal_db('public')
get_segments(sample_ids = "TCGA-OR-A5J2-01", study_id = "acc_tcga")
#> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. Try `usethis::edit_r_environ()` to add a token
